What is your name
responses: Hi! I am a Mr Hill the fix it guy for UMIS portal
I am Mr Hill, here to help with problems you may have navigating through UMIS after logging in as a student
I am Mr Hill, what can I do for you pertaining to your UMIS registration process as a student?

Bye!
Happy to be of help

responses: You are most welcome
Happy I could be of help
You can come back again whenever you need help

patterns: I want to register
How do I register
How do I begin registration
commence registration
begin registration
start registration
responses: Click on three dashes at the top right section of your screen then go to course selection after logging in and select commence registration

patterns: How do I pay my fees
How can I make payment
How do I pay
I am having difficulty paying my fees
I am having difficulty paying
I can not pay
How can I pay my fees
How do I pay my fees
Where can I pay my fees
responses: After selecting hall of residence, meal type, worship center and courses. Select finance,then current charges and click the green arrow button.

patterns: I could not select the hall I wanted
I need to select a hall
I need to select a hostel
can you help me pick a hall of residence
I cannot select my hall of residence
I cannot pick a hostel
I have a problem selecting a hostel
I have a problem picking a hostel
responses: The residence you have picked might either be reserved for a particular level or is full. Please select another one

patterns: I could not select the worship center I wanted
I need to select a worship center
I need to select a church
can you help me pick a worship center
I cannot select my church
I cannot pick a worship center
I have a problem selecting worship center
I have a problem picking a church
responses: Go to select worship centre under commence registration
The worship center you have picked is full. Please select other ones till you find a worship center that is not full

patterns: I could not select a meal type
How do I select a meal type
I need to select a meal type
I need to select a meal option
I need to pick a meal option
How do I pick a meal option
responses: Go to course selection and click select meal type to choose meal option

patterns: I have a problem
Can you help me with my problem
responses: Of course, you can tell me anything
Anything for a friend, what do you need?

patterns: How do I submit registration
How can I submit registration
How do I finish registration
responses: After selecting courses, meals, hall of residence and worship center. Make payment and wait for financial approval. Payment can only be approved if fees are completely paid

patterns: How do I select courses
How can I select my course
I can not find my course
How can I find my course
responses: Click course selection and select special selection from the list.For departmental courses, select your department name and browse through the list of courses. For GEDS courses, select general study division. To view selected courses click selected course list in course selection

patterns: How can I check my result
result
how can I view my result
how can I view my semester result
how can I see my result
responses: Click on academic details after clicking the three dashes at the top right corner of your screen, then select semester result

patterns: How can I check my transcript
transcript
how can I view my transcript
how can I view my full transcript
how can I see my transcript
responses: Click on academic details after clicking the three dashes at the top right corner of your screen, then select unofficial transcript

patterns: How can I submit course form
course form
how can I view course form
how can I see my course form
responses: To submit course form, click on the three dashes at the top right of your screen, select course selection then click submit course form. To view and print course form, click on finance and select print course form

patterns: How can I register previous semester
previous semester
how can I pay for previous semester
responses: To register previous semester, click the three dashes at the top of your screen, select Finance and then click register previous semester

patterns: How can I see school info
school info
how can I view school info
how can I see my school info
responses: To view school, click on the three dashes at the top right of your screen, select school then click name of your assigned school

patterns: How can I see my student details
student details
how can I view student details
responses: To view your details, click on the three dashes at the top right of your screen then select student details
